info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 10:37PM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Capital District, central Mohawk Valley, Schoharie Valleys, Helderbergs, northern Taconics, and the Lake George Saratoga Region. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions are expected to impact both the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will spread from south to north overnight and continue through the day Tuesday before ending by the evening. Snowfall rates may reach around half of an inch per hour at times on Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
